info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 7 at 9:49AM EDT until April 10 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...
White River.
Eel River at Bowling Green.
.Major flooding is occurring along the White River from Spencer on downstream due to multiple rounds of heavy rainfall that brought around 5 to 9 inches to the area. The crest on the lower White was at Spencer Monday morning and forecast to reach Newberry Tuesday night and Petersburg on Friday. Minor to moderate flooding continues on the upper and middle White, with the crest approaching Noblesville Monday morning and forecast to be downstream of the Indianapolis area gauges by Tuesday morning.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...White River near Centerton.
* WHEN...Until Thursday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 15.3 feet, Extensive flooding of agricultural lands. Blue Bluff and Paragon Roads are impassable. Flood waters affect a few homes in Waverly.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EDT Monday the stage was 16.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM EDT Monday was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued this evening by around 700 PM EDT /600 PM CDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY AFTERNOON

area.areaDesc: Monroe, IN; Morgan, IN; Owen, IN
